name: Keyhole Spy: Hot Nurses
description:
What's troubling you? Got autumn doldrums? Or maybe love fever? Here's a well-tried remedy for you - Keyhole Spy - Hot Nurses!
In this exciting match-three game you have to align identical items in order to undress hot nurses. They know exactly how to cure your boredom!Just follow these simple prescriptions:
  • Match items, and the girls will gradually take off their clothes;
  • Play a hot sliding puzzle;
  • Unlock achievements;
  • Try to undress all the nurses!

Remember: whatever disease you have, the beauties from Keyhole Spy - Hot Nurses are just what the doctor ordered!
